QueryResult.text: SELECT G.ID, NLS.LANGUAGE_CODE, NLS.NAME GROUP_NAME, NLS.DESCRIPTION, G.GROUP_CODE, G.GROUP_ROLE_TYPE, G.RIGHT_TYPE, G.GLOBAL_RIGHT_TYPE, L.LOOKUP_CODE GROUP_TYPE, G.PRINCIPAL_TYPE, G.PRINCIPAL_ID, G.IS_ACTIVE, G.IS_SYSTEM, G.CREATED_DATE, G.CREATED_BY, G.LAST_UPDATED_DATE, G.LAST_UPDATED_BY, G.IS_AUTOMATIC, G.LIC_RIGHT_TYPE FROM CMN_CAPTIONS_NLS NLS, CMN_SEC_GROUPS G, CMN_LOOKUPS L WHERE NLS.TABLE_NAME = 'CMN_SEC_GROUPS' AND NLS.PK_ID = G.CAPTIONS_PK_ID AND G.GROUP_TYPE_ID = L.ID AND L.LOOKUP_TYPE = 'SEC_GROUP_TYPE'
